attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjJKkhmiFlODBpG0jv_itemcontent
attribs.current: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjdAMENuzvbdPBJBfb_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 150/600

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjdv5s7YQ6wybXOO67_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjgfPvVf1MP8PjDsNT_description
attribs.current: See in Darkness up to 60 ft

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjgsCX9cnZqljKwm0I_description
attribs.current: Adv on saves against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjgvWKrdUdsh5ySVGc_description
attribs.current: You don't need sleep, meditate semiconscious for 4 hr/day. After resting this way you get same benefit as that of human after 8 hr sleep

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjgzpOvsASdvCJT1sk_description
attribs.current: prof with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVji-uqd9Z-bhOS8V3c_description
attribs.current: Can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjiWODZbwOwwV2Aijm_description
attribs.current:
Beginning at 1st level, you have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy.

Choose a type of favored enemy:  Humanoid orcs and Goblinoids.

You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence Checks to recall information about them.

Language: Orc

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVjjcExHZ9H1qyuakci_description
attribs.current:
You are particularly familiar with one type of natural Environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: 

Terrain: Forest

 When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.

While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, you gain the following benefits:

Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel.
Your group can't become lost except by magical means.
Even when you are engaged in another Activity While Traveling (such as foraging, navigating, or tracking), you remain alert to danger.
If you are traveling alone, you can move stealthily at a normal pace.
When you forage, you find twice as much food as you normally would.
While tracking other creatures, you also learn their exact number, their sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjklXDkO6ZorPhhQd6_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjksn07NQOV4UufzNK_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjkw6FTz79sxj3cvrI_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjl64XOMkMkZCJylH0_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjlKAqc5ycT9bvKxzh_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjlLpRSW0uhJpiIM56_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjlR67QSPpZOGIRcEc_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjlR67QSPpZOGIRcEc_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LVjlUSXgT3QrVMEgkXA_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I’m always ready to lend help.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
I refuse to become a victim, and I will not allow others to be victimized.
I don’t talk about the thing that torments me. I’d rather not burden others with my curse.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current:
I like to know my enemy’s capabilities and weaknesses before rushing into battle. (Lawful)
I try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current:
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I would sacrifice my life and my soul to protect the innocent.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current:
I have trouble trusting in my allies.
I feel no compassion for the dead. They’re the lucky ones.

attribs.name: character_appearance
attribs.current:
Male
Green Eyes
Medium size
Height: 5'10"
Hair: Brown
Skin: Copper/Green
Age: 200 yr
Weight: 150 lbs

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current:
Organization: Emerald Enclave

Allies: With his tribe destroyed and family believed to be dead his only remaining allies are the woodland creatures and a few close friends. Finster, the halfling, whom lived near his village. He is carefree and and as trustworthy a friend as you can have. Chade and Finster have had many adventures together in their youth and more than once saved each others lives. If there is one person in the world that Chade can count on it is Finster

Enemies: Any and all orcs

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: The last remaining member of your tribe located in the small settlement of Mhiilaniir in The High Forest of Faerûn. You are the lone survivor of a vicious attack by a group of orcs seeking to plunder your village. You were grievously injured and knocked unconscious while attempting to protect your wife and young son. You awoke to find your family missing, and assumed dead. Now you choose to wear a carved wooden mask to hide your scars, both inside and out. You are a rugged individualist seeking solitude in the wilds. The wilds are in your blood and you know the way of the forests. You have an affinity for woodland creatures and oftentimes find comfort in their companionship over that of other beings. You now travel the lands forsaking the forests of your youth to protect the innocent from those who would cause them harm. All the while, hoping to reunite your family once again, whether it be in this life or the next. In this world there are a thousand ways to die in the wilderness, and you have survived through muscle, wits, and will.
